beer.beer_description:
One taste of this combo can transport you to the backstreet izakayas of Tokyo, and we’ve set out to
replicate this with the citrusy Yagi Pale Ale.

Citra, Talus, Motueka and Riwaka are all known for delivering citrus flavours and we’ve added them by
the bucketload. Bright dekopon is the dominant character, punching through from first sip to last,
with a soft, mid-palate cannabis note from the Chinook rounding into a dry finish.
Best served with a bowl of perfectly seasoned noodles.

APPEARANCE:Pale straw.
AROMA: Pink grapefruit and mojito-lime.
FLAVOUR:Bright and fresh sumo citrus with sweet kush-like notes of cedar and vanilla.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 130 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 27!

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 200 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 41! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 50 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 11!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 90 check-ins with a photo.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 90 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 19! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 45 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 275 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 56.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 70 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 15!

Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 480 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 97!
